backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing leads, user profiles, and admin authorization with CRUD-like functions and bootstrap-token-based admin initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing routing, components, sections, and styling updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and utility styles with OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, dark mode, and mounting the main React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling client-side routing, page rendering, and insights article slug resolution.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Provides a form to grant admin privileges by validating a Principal ID and calling the backend actor method.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminToken: Allows submission of a bootstrap token to initialize the first admin, handling success and error states.
frontend/src/components/contact/CompanyP: Displays a dialog collecting lead info for downloading the company profile and triggers a download after successful submission.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactO: Renders a grid of contact options including booking calls, downloading the profile, emailing, and WhatsApp messaging.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, attribution, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/forms/ControlLea: Lead generation form collecting business details and challenges, submitting them via the lead submission hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/FounderCon: Inquiry form for the Founder Control Blueprint, validating inputs and submitting detailed lead information.
frontend/src/components/forms/Industries: A lead generation form collecting user, company, and industry details with validation and success handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/InsightsNe: A newsletter signup form with email, company, and revenue validation plus success and reset states.
frontend/src/components/forms/ProcessLea: A process-focused lead form capturing company challenges with validation, error states, and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/forms/StrategySe: A strategy session application form collecting detailed business info and bottlenecks before submitting a lead.
frontend/src/components/industries/CaseS: A card component for viewing case study PDFs or details, supporting click actions and conditional buttons.
A modal displaying case study details with sectioned text or bullet lists and close controls.
frontend/src/components/industries/indus: Defines TypeScript interfaces and static content for industries, major services, and case studies.
frontend/src/components/industries/Indus: Renders an industry section with challenges, solutions, major services, and case studies, including click handling for case study details.
frontend/src/components/industries/Major: Displays a service tile with an image fallback and label for industry major services.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopContr: Floating scroll-to-top button that appears after scrolling 400px.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders the contact section with email, phone, address, and a button to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/Control: Displays the CONTROL framework steps with images and navigation to the framework page.
frontend/src/components/sections/Emotion: A thematic section emphasizing founder dependency and business infrastructure messaging.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Final call-to-action section prompting users to book a strategy call.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with a background and embedded HeroSlider component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSli: Implements a multi-slide hero carousel with navigation, drag/swipe support, and CTA actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Industr: Renders a grid of industry cards with icons, titles, and descriptions over a decorative background.
frontend/src/components/sections/Insight: Displays the first three insight articles with navigation handlers and a button to view all insights.
frontend/src/components/sections/Outcome: Shows key outcome bullet points and an accompanying dashboard visual for post‑Inovics transformation.
frontend/src/components/sections/PageHer: Reusable hero section with customizable title, subtitle, description, background image, and optional children.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Lists common business problems using icon cards and ends with a strong systems‑focused message.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Accordion-based four‑step process explaining diagnosis, architecture, implementation, and optimization phases.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Renders a grid of tech stack logos with labels under a section header.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIno: Displays three feature cards—Control, Clarity, Continuity—describing Inovics' core value proposition.
frontend/src/components/shared/StandardB: Provides reusable bullet list components using checkmark icons for consistent styling.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with scroll-based styling, hash-section scrolling, client-side routing, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInitializatio: Checks whether admin initialization is complete by querying the backend actor, scoped per principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLeads.ts: Fetches all leads for admin users using react-query with identity-specific cache keys and connection retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks if the current identity is an admin via actor.isCallerAdmin with error handling and refetch support.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs backend health checks through actor.healthCheck and exposes status, message, and manual refetch.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead data through the backend actor with health checks, loading state, errors, and retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates on system preference changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, utility classes, and reduced-motion behavior.
frontend/src/lib/contactConfig.ts: Exports contact-related URLs and company info for use across the app.
frontend/src/lib/strategyCall.ts: Navigates the user to the strategy-session page with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/lib/techStackLogos.ts: Provides configuration for tech stack logos including labels, image paths, and alt text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard handling authentication, admin checks, lead fetching, and bootstrap token generation UI.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with a hero, contact options, inquiry form, and qualification details, including hash‑based scrolling on load.
Displays the CONTROL framework with a hero, descriptions, staged methodology, and a scroll-to-form CTA.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows a hero and an accordion of FAQs with structured question–answer lists and a final call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/IndustriesPage.tsx: Provides industry-specific sections, case study modal handling, and a lead-gen flow framed by a hero and consistency summary.
frontend/src/pages/insights/CanYourBusin: Displays the article for the 'Can Your Business Run Without You?' insight using shared layout and section rendering.
frontend/src/pages/insights/components/I: Provides the shared layout for insight articles, including SEO updates, back navigation, and styled content container.
frontend/src/pages/insights/components/u: Custom hook that manages document title and meta description updates for insight pages with cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/pages/insights/CrmVsErpWhat: Renders the CRM vs ERP insight article using the generic InsightArticleLayout and mapped article sections.
frontend/src/pages/insights/ExcelIsNotAB: Shows the 'Excel Is Not a Business System' article with structured sections inside the common article layout.
frontend/src/pages/insights/FromFounderD: Renders the 'From Founder-Driven to System-Driven' insight article through the shared article layout.
frontend/src/pages/insights/insightArtic: Defines article metadata and content for all insight articles, keyed by slug.
frontend/src/pages/insights/insightSlugs: Defines stable slugs, titles, ordering, and helper functions for insight article identification and lookup.
frontend/src/pages/insights/TheHiddenCos: Displays the 'Hidden Cost of Manual Reporting' insight article using the reusable layout and section mapping.
frontend/src/pages/insights/WhyGrowthBre: Renders the 'Why Growth Breaks Weak Infrastructure' article with standard layout and dynamically mapped sections.
frontend/src/pages/InsightsPage.tsx: Renders the Insights hub with metadata setup, article grid navigation, and a newsletter signup section.
frontend/src/pages/ProcessPage.tsx: Outlines the company’s transformation philosophy and 4‑stage process with a hero, structured sections, and lead-gen CTA.
frontend/src/pages/StrategySessionPage.t: Renders the Strategy Session landing page with hero content, target-audience sections, and a scroll-to-form action. Includes form focus logic and styled UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project state and pending feature requests, mainly focused on generating and storing an INOVICS-themed PPTX presentation within the project files.
